website_summaries.verdict: Great-looking pool table that comes with a 75" playing field and 2.25" billiard balls included.
pros: Rubber bumpers along the edges of the table yield realistic game play
Leg-leveling mechanism ensures a properly leveled playing surface
cons: The price is high compared to some other at-home tables

customer_reviews.title: Great table in this price range
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price. I assembled it solo in about 90 minutes. I had a couple of friends over to flip it over, then leveled it out in about 30 minutes. - It may be the slightest bit high in the center, where you can’t adjust it, but it is really hard to tell for sure. - The cloth does seem to take damage a tad easily - The ball return opening is just big enough to remove one ball at a time in each hand. Other than those details, it is a very nice looking table and is plenty good enough for me to practice on, without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: k o a l a

customer_reviews.title: Arrived slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the pool table for our family room. It fits the description and overall I'm happy with it. Unfortunately it arrived slightly damaged. We didn't notice the damage until after we put the whole thing together. It is pretty heavy and would be a pain to take apart and return. I've tried contacting the seller, however the number provided is no longer in service. So in that regard I'm pretty disappointed and I could only give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!! Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great definitely worth the money! It’s not pro level but it’s entertaining. It’s a great size for adults to play. I was VERY worried about it because of the reviews but man it was worth the risk. Setting it up was a piece of cake def better of someone else helps just to help flip.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re expecting to get a bar or billiard hall table for $600; you’re going to be disappointed but if you want an inexpensive table that is really easy to put together you’re going to be satisfied. The only problem I have is that it is slow because of the wood slate but like I said for the money it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Pool Table
customer_reviews.text: Pool table is perfect for entry level use. We love the pool table. Actually I was surprised at the high quality for entry level table on a budget. Pool return works well. Nice feature to have. Pool cues are a little cheap, but they were free with the table. Suggest get your own cues to use. The balls are heavy and work well. Needs better rack, suggest getting your own. Table has nice quality cloth and pockets. Shipment was well packed, I had to hire a installation service to assembly. I highly recommend professional installation. Makes for a better experience! I am at the age where I do not assembler products anymore. Go professional Service. Great Table!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coll

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool table its very nice for the price. We plan on eventually upgrading to a slate table but this one works great for now. I do wish that the triangle was a little bigger but other then that were very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out great. We honestly were not expecting this high quality for the price we paid. The blue color is vivid but looks great for a pool table instead of the traditional green. Assembly was easy as well. I think that this product is very sturdy and weighs around 350 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: abrooks21

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pool table. It was relatively easy to put together and is lots of fun for our whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Billiard Table 7ft
customer_reviews.text: Overall the table came in in good shape minus a minor damage underneath the back side of the table it was a bit torn and there was minor damage with the paint on one side of the table and the cue sticks that were provided were extremely cheap and we ended up not using them because they had no tips. Also the rails are not of high-quality and are not deflective enough and the area where you get the balls from is very small it’s very tight on the hands to retrieve the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect for room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mid range pool table. Seems sturdy. Pool sticks are REALLY cheap. In fact both broke within a day. I'd still by the table again but I suggest ordering sticks or super glue
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I just like to shoot around with friends and hope something goes ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not serious pool player or even a pool player at all. I just like to shoot around with friends and hope something goes in! And I don't know or even care about the difference between slate and MDF or any of the other specifications between this and a more expensive table. I bought this table strictly for fun and to entertain at gatherings and it is definitely a hit. And for the price I couldn't be happier with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Price somewhat hi
customer_reviews.text: The table wears easy and the felt can not be changed without buying a whole new top.You just keep the legs and pay them around 500.00 . not a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: A  E  Sines

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was Good, but Quality of Table Felt was Not!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was yesterday (09/28/20) and good delivery service! After opening box yesterday looking at Table Felt, Not Happy!! Felt has marks, indentations!! I called Tucson, GLD Products yesterday to report the problem. Had to leave Voice Message! Will not proceed with assembly, waiting for respond on what there going to do!!!
customer_reviews.author: GWM

customer_reviews.title: Not the best buy
customer_reviews.text: Pool table delivered with damage to box. Once opened and I inspected it had a long crack, several dings. The felt had a few places that were tears. Looks like it was used. Overall I like the felt color. I expected a little better quality being it's over $600.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Decent value but damaged returned product
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble and is a decent table for the price. Delivery drivers were not prepared for room delivery that I paid extra for. Product did not appear to be new as advertised. There are stains on top, damage to legs, and missing pieces from repackaged part container.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: fine, just the balls sometime get stuck on the ...
customer_reviews.text: fine , just the balls sometime get stuck on the way down after being hit in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The table is easy to set up, but will require two or more people male sure you have screw drivers handy.. It is heavy over 200 lbs. Very easy to level as well. The table itself is very nice for the price. The sticks that come with it are very light and generic. Great for kids though. I purchased two heavier 21 oz. Sticks and everything is great. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's good if you dont care about quality. My table came damaged because it's cheap material. Invest on a slate table if you want quality. I was looking for something that was easy to assemble and good playing surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Chadee

customer_reviews.title: The shipping and packaging was terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The table was delivered damage in 4 different areas. Very disappointed in the packaging. I was expecting to receive a product that i could be proud of. Not a damaged pick of crap. Not worth my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Game anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Pool table is perfect for the man cave. Not too big not too small. Husband and friends enjoy it every Friday night. Great home tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: PriceKids03

customer_reviews.title: not that good
customer_reviews.text: the corners was all white like it was scratched on something white... and there wasnt a 3rd hole for one of the legs . it wasnt drilled so we couldnt screw in one of the screws.
customer_reviews.author: tinarosss

customer_reviews.title: Love thr modern design
customer_reviews.text: Love thr modern design. Easy to install, easy to move and good quality for the price. We are really happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Sulbiye Peters

customer_reviews.title: pool table installed easy and looks great but the quality on the felt ...
customer_reviews.text: pool table installed easy and looks great but the quality on the felt was marginal and the wood pool sticks were unfinished 2ft. from the end of the stick making it hard to shoot with a smooth shot.
customer_reviews.author: robert meyer

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to assemble and level
customer_reviews.text: Obviously you buy a pool table online with some skepticism. I am no different. This table arrived well before the projected date through Wayfair. Its a heavy box but it's a pool table so....This was very easy to assemble and level. This looks great in the man cave and plays as well as I want it to. I wasn't looking to pay 1700 for a table but I what got is very acceptable and will be fun for the whole family. Also, while the cue sticks are very very light they are not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Warrick38

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled. Extremely heavy, will need a few hands to get into a room you want it be at. Table itself is quite nice to play on. Only thing I was not happy about is that it came slightly damaged at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: S Padayachee

customer_reviews.title: great table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these tables for my teen center. They are very easy to put together. Very heavy. Beautiful blue felt. Only 2 flaws. 1: the cue ball goes to the same area as the rest of the balls so when you scratch, you have to find it among the others. Not a big deal but it is an inconvenience. 2: delivery guy just left this 300 pound table outside my home and left. Very rude. They could, seeing as they are the ones getting paid, have put it atleast under the covered front porch. Great tables, horrible delivery people. But 5 stars!!! The kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: It is alot better than I thought it was going to be i ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table just to pass some time. It is alot better than I thought it was going to be i have it in the basement it only took me and another guy to put it the there. It took about 2 hours for set up including leveling was the easiest table i ever put together and it plays nice great rebound on the rails would recommend this to anyone. The sticks are cheap but playing for fun they work
customer_reviews.author: chris baugh

customer_reviews.title: I love this pool table!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about getting a nice pool table that I could afford and this table has not disappointed me yet. It's true that I've only had it since Wednesday March 4, 2015, but it has gotten a lot of use and we have great family fun with it. The setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Pepsi Cola

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great , but after 2 months of having it the phelp on to of the table started to peel up not from use .. Shouldn't be after 2 months .. I guess ok for a table for home use
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is no high-end slate pool table. That being said, we assembled ours and tried it out for the first time and I was very pleased. It looks really nice and is great for the price! This pool table is perfect if you're just looking for something fun. It's in my husbands "man cave" and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BMcC

customer_reviews.title: Damage to pool table
customer_reviews.text: When I got the pool table the pool it was damaged in two different spots and I didn't return it because I didn't want to put up with the hassle of going through all the rigmarole of fixing up
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fat Cat Tucson Billiard Table
customer_reviews.text: A very deccent table. Not really a serious table for proffesional player or for serious gaming. the table was new but had some visible mistakes during the asembling.
customer_reviews.author: JVR

customer_reviews.title: Great table for its money the delivery people were very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table for its money the delivery people were very helpful as long as you ask for their help and yes you do need more than one person to help you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I HATE THE FIRST SHIPMENT WAS DAMAGED IT WAS SUPPOSED TO ...
customer_reviews.text: I HATE THE FIRST SHIPMENT WAS DAMAGED IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE A GIFT. RETURNED IT ONLY TO GET ANOTHER DAMAGED TABLE. BUT THE COMPANY DOESNT CARE BECAUSE THEY GOT PAID. BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: MontyMD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This table looks very sharp in person once it is all put together. It was very easy to set up and was a good buy. I have to say I was shocked that it was delivered by one guy, who so very nicely left it in my driveway and said "good luck getting it inside." as he left. NOT what I was expecting. I would have been happy to pay a little extra to have them bring it in and put it where I wanted. It took 3 people to move it and it was very heavy. Just expect to need some help transporting it when they deliver.
customer_reviews.author: annieco13

customer_reviews.title: ok inexpensive table but they made me work to get it
customer_reviews.text: I know its an inexpensive pool table by pool table standards but the quality is poor. The first one we received had a defect and shipping damage, Amazon had me call supplier directly and they were very poor on support, finally got Amazon to get me another one and finally got the table set up about 40 days after placing the first order. You get what you pay for and sometime you have to pay in other ways. would not recommend this table unless you want "new" and cheap
customer_reviews.author: outdoor guy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money i paid for it, they dropped it off to my house i and another friend brought in it and assembled it within 2 hours. Had to level it off but for the most part a good table for a fun time not a professional table but good for kids or drinking a few beers with a buddy and shooting some pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Gandy, but for fun, WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Look, if you want a slate $4000 table, go buy one, But if you want a fun table, at low cost and easy to set up, THIS IS IT! Great table for the money, no its not perfect, but once leveled, its as good a some cheap bar room table,
customer_reviews.author: Club Vest

customer_reviews.title: great for summer time fun
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product not knowing a damn thing about pool tables.... lol, but when we had it all set up which took hours because they will not bring it into your house so carrying it was a damn hall once we had it all set up the table was level we diddnt have to move it or anything!!! its great although the ball catcher could be bigger because if you arent a skinny mini your hand could possibly get stuck so be careful with that. but it plays fine its beautiful its for sure a nice impressive toy
customer_reviews.author: monica olson

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price - easy to set up and plays really well. We have limited space so I put it in the living room and got carpet sliders to move it against the wall when we're finished playing. We're playing every day and my 14 year old is actually pretty good. No complaints yet!
customer_reviews.author: gingerpike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too easy for screws to come a loose from size
customer_reviews.author: rcooper

product_meta.title: Fat Cat Tucson 7’ Pool Table with Automatic Ball Return, Electric Blue Playing Surface and Included Billiard Accessories to Play Out of The Box
product_meta.description: The stylish arcade-style Fat Cat Tucson MMXI 7-Foot Billiard Game Table will distinguish your game room with its electric-blue playing surface and sleek look. This billiards table lends an air of a billiards hall to your game room with the easy ball return similar to those in billiards halls. It is equipped with a 3/4" MDF playing surface, rubber bumpers, and leg-levelers that can aid in keeping your table completely level even if the flooring is not flat. Also included with this table are two pieces of chalk, a resin triangle, two 57" two-piece billiard cues, and a set of 2-1/4" billiard balls. The dimensions of the table are 84" L x 46-1/2" W x 31" H, and the playfield measures 75" L x 37-1/2" W.
feature_bullets: Distinctive arcade-style designed 7-foot billiard table with distinguished electric-blue playing surface
Play as if you were at your pool league, in the comfort of your home, with the easy ball return outfitted on this tasteful table
Equipped with 3/4" MDF playing surface, rubber bumpers, and leg-levelers to keep your pool table level even on uneven flooring
Includes two pieces of chalk, resin triangle, two 57" two-piece billiard cues, and set of 2-1/4" billiard balls
Dimensions: 84" L x 46-1/2" W x 31" H; Playfield measures 75" L x 37-1/2" W
